name: Hydrapak Stow Bottle 500ml
description:
When hard water bottles are too heavy and bulky, reach for the Stow. This pared-down, minimalist water bottle holds 500ml of your favourite hydrating drink. When you're finished, the soft body packs down to nearly nothing to fit in a pocket or pack.Puncture-resistant TPU with RF welds for durability.Collapses down for easy packing.Spillproof nozzle is easy to drink from when on the move.28mm opening accommodates water filters and is easy to fill.Soft bail handle is comfy to carry and doubles as a retention loop when the bottle is rolled up.

        Sustainability
